CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."PAC_PRC_ADJWIPAPPROVEITEM_SP" ( adjustgroupno NUMBER , userid VARCHAR2 ) AS newwipno_out NUMBER; BEGIN /* Called From: Procedure :- Trigger :- PMD TransactionId :- WMD ActionId :- Modified By :Nitin Modified Date :07/25/01 */
SP_ADJWIPAPPROVELINEITEM(adjustgroupno, userid, newwipno_out); END;
